text: Police are on the look out for an inmate of the Borstal School here who gave the authorities the slip on Sunday. E. Nagarajan (19) of Udayapatti, Tiruchi district, who was lodged at the Borstal School after being charged in a theft case, escaped when the inmates were allowed to take bath inside the campus early in the morning. It is said that when he was not noticed, Nagarajan scaled the wall to escape. Investigation was under way.
title: Boy escapes from Borstal school
